title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 300.21 - Deductions allowable in determining proceeds of recovery in third-party actions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 300.21 - Deductions allowable in determining proceeds of recovery in third-party actions

State Regulations

The net proceeds received by claimant from a third-party
action, less reasonable medical or funeral expenses paid or incurred by him, shall be credited to the carrier in determining whether deficiency compensation
is due. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
300.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
